summary: On a late night visit to an ATM, three co-workers end up in a desperate fight for their lives when they become trapped by an unknown man.
cast: Brian Geraghty|Alice Eve|Josh Peck|Mike O'Brian|Robert Huculak|Ernesto Griffith|Bryan Terrell Clark|Dan De Jaeger|Omar Alex Khan|Aaron Hughes|Will Woytowich|Glen Thompson|Edgar Governo
title: ATM
